author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Hedge Fund Veterans Plan $100M BNB Treasury Bet
description: The move comes amid a growing trend of corporations adopting bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as a treasury reserve asset.
content:
A group of hedge fund executives are planning to raise $100 million to buy Binances 
 token through a Nasdaq-listed shell company.Former Coral Capital Holdings partners Patrick Horsman, Joshua Kruge… [+592 chars]
